name: Xhander Universal: Xhander a Platformer 4
description:
Introducing the 4th instalment of the "Xhander: A Platformer" series, meets an all new embarkment of an adventure; Run, Jump and Take yourself into this new, refurbished platforming experience!

Archibald Axolotl has made a return in his comeuppance of evil schemes, as he has trapped the souls of your friends, and has sent foes to various parts of the universe to go against you and fight in order to capture your soul.

Despite the various occurring incidents, Xhander is not tempted to offer his incarnations to the infamous Archibald, as he'll do whatever it takes to prevent tyrannical acts from occurring and to save the world!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • 4 Playable Characters + A Secret, Invincible Character,
  • Over 15 Unique Worlds, with 7 Bosses to fight,
  • Animated Cutscenes,
  • A Creative, Original Soundtrack,
  • Tons of unique enemies,
  • A large moveset, with substantial amounts of replayability,
  • Playable in more than one language,
  • Tons of achievements to get in the Gamejolt version,
  • An Overall enjoyable experience!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
